roleset.name: attach, connect things together
roleset.note: JOIN-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Verbnet class mix-22.1-2-1. (from join.01-v)

example.name: join-v: straight transitive
example.text: Mr. Harper, a veteran of several manufacturing companies who-1 *trace*-1 joined Campbell in 1986, will take charge of all overseasoperations as well as Pepperidge.

example.name: join-v: join in, as arg1
example.text: ``Anheuser is the biggest guy in the bar, and he-1 just decided *trace*-1 to join in the barroom brawl,'' said Joseph J. Doyle, ananalyst with Smith Barney, Harris Upham& Co.

example.name: join-v: join sm in, as argM-PRD
example.text: Bowing to criticism, Bear Stearns, Morgan Stanley and Oppenheimer joined PaineWebber in suspending stock-index arbitrage trading fortheir own accounts.
example.arg: Bear Stearns, Morgan Stanley and Oppenheimer
in suspending stock-index arbitrage trading for their own accounts

example.name: join-v: join as
example.text: In Barry Wright, Mr. Sim sees a situation ``very similar'' to the one he faced when he joined Applied as president and chiefoperating officer in 1985.
example.arg: as president and chief operating officer

example.name: join-v: with instrument
example.text: John joined the fragments of his coffee cup with duct tape.
example.arg: the fragments of his coffee cup

example.name: join-v: take that
example.text: Then, Mary joined John's coffee cup to the table with super-glue.

example.name: joining-n: when 2 things are appear in one node, use arg1
example.text: The joining of an egg and sperm is call fertilization

roleset.name: come into the company of, be together with

role.descr: secondary predication (with something, like news, for example)

example.name: join-v: with news
example.text: Mike Hanna joins us with the latest from Ramallah

roleset.name: join in
roleset.note: JOIN_IN-V NOTES: Frame created by Jena. See Verbnet class mix-22.1-2. (from join.05-v)

example.name: join_in-v:
example.text: Just imagine, 80% of our village, that is, 120 women joined in
example.arg: 80% of our village, that is 120 women

roleset.name: become a member of
roleset.note: JOIN_UP-V NOTES: See Verbnet class mix-22.1-2. (from join.02-v)

example.name: join_up-v: with instrument
example.text: Tel Hamie acknowledges that if Barak had succeeded in [*PRO*-1] gettingSharon to join up in a new government, the Prime Minister would have amajority in parliament.

example.name: join_up-v
example.text: Soong joined up with a political novice with neither wealth nor mobilizing capability.
example.arg: with a political novice with neither wealth nor mobilizing capability
